attributes.action: Petition the government to ask the Queen to suspend Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
6 to 1 MPs voted for the referendum 
17.4 million voted leave
We were promised it would be honoured
2017 elections 
80% of MPs manifesto voted to deliver Brexit
PM cannot lie to the people
MPs have no right to veto 17.4 million people's votes
Our right to vote was given in 1918
We can no longer trust Parliament to honour that right
attributes.background:
We had a referendum in 2016
It was passed in parliament and A/50 
Was triggered by 498 votes 
This was passed by royal assent 
The biggest result in history is being overturned by a rogue Parliament 
Who no longer serve the British public
